definitions.body: a city of Judah Jos 15:57 (perh. one of two villages called Gabaa, Gabatha in Onom. v. Lag: Onom. 246, 128; 2nd ed 255, 160).

city of Benj. Ju Jdg 19:14, Jdg 19:16 + 20 t. Ju, 1Sa 10:26, 1Sa 14:2, 1Sa 22:6, 1Sa 26:1, 2Sa 23:29 = 1Ch 11:31; also Ho 5:8, Ho 9:9, Ho 10:9, Ho 10:9 (cf. Ju Jdg 19:12 ff. Jdg 13:2; perh. also 1Sa 7:1, 1Sa 10:10, 2Sa 6:3, 2Sa 6:4 rd. also (for [[גבע]]) 1Sa 13:16, Ju Jdg 20:10, Jdg 20:33; = [[גִּבְעַת]] Jos 18:28; called also [[גִּבְעַת בִּנְיׇמִין]] 1Sa 13:2, 1Sa 13:15, 1Sa 14:16, & [[גִּבְעַת שָׁאוּל]] 1Sa 11:4, 1Sa 15:34, Is 10:29; 2Sa 21:6 rd. prob. [[גִּבְעוֹן]] LXX We Dr. †
a city of Ephraim, called [[גִּבְעַת פִּֽינְחָס]] Jos 24:33.
